XML.MSG: Log into the Netmarble GUNZ home page first and select the server in the server list to operate the GUNZ.
Details of the chatting have been reported.
You do not have the authority to chat.
Can be implemented in the lobby only.
Can be implemented in the waiting room only.
Can be implemented in the game only.
The screen shot is saved in "My Documents$1".
An attempt to save the screen shot has failed.
Recording has been saved in the file "My Documents$1".
Voting on the forced exit of '%s' has started.
If you want to participate in the voting, press 'Y' if you consent; 'N' if you do not.
Select the user that should be out
$1 is trying to form '$3'Clan with $2. Do you agree?
$1 refused the offer to create a clan.
The clan is closed. The clan will be completed closed by 7:00 AM CST.
Only the Clan Master can execute.
Only the Clan Master and Clan Administrator can execute.
You have already joined a clan.
You have not joined the clan.
'$1' Do you agree to join the clan?
You have withdrawn from the clan.
Clan Master cannot withdraw from the clan.
Deletion cannot be done while you are a clan member. Withdraw from the clan first.
The selected member has been removed from the clan.
You have to select $1 members for clan creation in order to create a clan.
Are you sure that you want to close the clan?
Are you sure that you want to withdraw from the clan?
Cannot be deleted as it is equipped with cash equipment(or item).
You are back previous resolution in $1 second(s).
You have not joined the clan.
Please use a free channel if you do not want the level restraint.
You are to fight with all users regardless of the channel in the league game.
$1 is invited to the Chat Room.
$1 has invited you the Chat Room '$2'.
Will be converted to the Chat Room '$1'.
Request being made to open the Chat Room ...
Request being made to join the Chat Room ...
Please wait until the player agrees.
$1 has invited you to a game. Do you accept?
Select the right number of people.
$1 have invited you to a clan war. Do you accept?
'$1' Clan defeated '$2' Clan and filled with energy after recording $3 wins in a row.
'$1' Clan defeated '$2' Clan recording $3 wins in a row.
'$1' Clan defeated '$2' Clan to record $3 wins in a row without hitch.
'$1' Clan defeated '$2' Clan to successfully record $3 wins in a row.
'$1' Clan defeated '$2' Clan to mark $3 wins in a row.
'$1' Clan defeated '$2' Clan blocking its way into a third consecutive win.
'$1' has won $4 Duel Matches in a row in $3 room of '$2' channel.
'$2' has stopped '$1' from the winning streak of $3 Duel Matches straight.
You can move a lot faster than in the general state.
You can enter even when you are in the air. (Close weapon prerequisite)
During defense, you can completely block all the bullets and swords.
Impossible to defend the lower part.
In case of a long sword, it hits the counterpart to suspend in the air. In case of
a dagger it pushes the counterpart to suspend him/her with its pushing power.
A successful fall-down onto the ground reduces the additional damage that you
might suffer as you cannot move lying on the ground.
You can avoid an attack by tumbling.
You can also shoot a gun when tumbling.
Click the right button of the mouse when suspended in the air and armed with a weapon for
close combat you can suspend yourself from the wall using the weapon for close combat.
Press the JUMP key when you are close to the wall
to make another jump against it.
Press the Jump Key when the character stands diagonal against the wall while moving
forward then the character can automatically run on the wall.
You can climb along the wall.
Unless you are very close to the wall, the function does not work.
You have been killed by your explosives.
To play, press the Fire key!
You are out of the game in $1 second(s).
The item has been brought in.
The item cannot be brought in.
There is no character to select. Create a character first.
You go to the next round in $1 second(s).
There is a word '$1' that you cannot use.
A hacking attempt has been detected.

A hacking attempt has been detected. In accordance with the agreement that members have consented, the GUNZ Operation Team continues to monitor and collect information on the users who hack. Keep in mind that all the responsibility brought about by committing any illegal act in civil or criminal case falls on the shoulders of the user who commits such an illegal act.
You can mount or release an equipment by dragging an icon. You cannot send a bounty equipment(item) to the Central Bank.
WARNING: GunZ does not support the $1. You may be unable to view certain fonts or proceed with gameplay. Do you still wish to continue?
GunZ requires DirectX 9.0c to run properly. Would you like to install DirectX 9.0c now?
Please enter 'YES' if you wish to delete this character.
